name: Dark Dreams (ComplxEntertainment, Pringle)
description:
Something dark consumes Mr Johnsons mind. What terrible act did he commit? More so what drove him to this state? Navigate through various dark dreams and uncover Mr Johnsons secrets. You must PUZZLE together the events that led to that fateful night. Can you hold your mind together, or will the darkness consume you? 

Please note; this is a short demo version of the game - the full game is currently in development and we are making good progress with hopes to releasing in the near future. We may push updates to the demo until the full game is released. We welcome all feedback and constructive criticism on our discord 

All donations go towards the production and staff of this game to make final release an amazing experience for players. Top five donators will be named in the credits of the full game.

complxent@gmail.com

Join our discord server for more updates!
